channel.description: Recent content in rosie on Bodacious Blog

item.title: Rosie Pattern Matching Language (RPL)
item.description: bracket expressions 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 -- a sequence of expressions (the pliers ie. squeezed together) {e1 e2 ... en} === e1 e2 ... en -- ~ matches a token boundary (e1 e2 ... en) === e1 ~ e2 ~ ... ~ en -- / is the ordered choice operator [e1 e2 ... en] === e1 / e2 / ... / en Thoughts It will be useful in parsing s-expressions.
